Dialogues.Value: *Вздох*... Я просто мечтал о спорте.$s#$e#Я правда очень хочу стать спортивным аналитиком.Если у меня не получится, я буду разбит.#$e#Это напомнило мне, что сегодня нужно обновить свой спортивный сайт.

Dialogues.Key: Oh, do you know that guy Josh? He thinks he's going to become a sports pro.#$e#At least my goals are a little bit more realistic.
Dialogues.Value: Ой, ты знаешь, того парня, Джоша? Он думает, что он может стать профи в спорте.#$e#По крайней мере, мои цели немного более реалистичным.

Dialogues.Key: I'd like to start a small chicken farm someday.#$e#Well, I guess I'd like to have a large supply of jalapeno chips and pizza, too...#$e#Oh, sorry. I was getting carried away!
Dialogues.Value: Я бы хотел запустить небольшую куриную ферму когда-нибудь.#$e#Ну, я думаю, я бы хотел иметь большой запас чипсов халапеньо и пиццы...#$e#Ой, прости. Что-то я размечтался!

Dialogues.Key: I like staying here because I get to be around chickens.#$e#I like how excitable chickens are. Each one has a different personality, just like people!#$e#Maybe if I don't make it as a sports analyst I will become a chicken man. Whatever that means.$h
Dialogues.Value: Я люблю останавливаться здесь, потому что мне нравится когда вокруг много цыплят.#$e#Мне нравится, как ведут себя куры. У Каждой из них есть своя личность, как и у людей!#$e#Может быть, если я не смогу стать спортивным аналитиком я стану человеком курицей. Чтобы это не значило.$h

Dialogues.Key: I do like chickens, but I don't want to live with my aunt forever...$s#$e#Oh well...
Dialogues.Value: Я люблю кур, но я не хочу вечно жить с тетей...$s#$e#Ну да ладно

Dialogues.Key: Yea... maybe you're right... maybe I should focus on something more practical, like chicken farming.$s
Dialogues.Value: Да... возможно ты прав... может, мне стоит сосредоточиться на чем-то более практичном, например на птицеводстве.^Да... возможно ты права... может, мне стоит сосредоточиться на чем-то более практичном, например на птицеводстве.$s

Dialogues.Key: Really? It makes me so nervous... but I want to do it.
Dialogues.Value: Правда? Это заставляет меня нервничать... но я хочу сделать это.

Dialogues.Key: Oh, a stranger! My name's Vincent.#$b#Momma says not to talk to strangers... But you seem okay.
Dialogues.Value: О,незнакомец! Меня зовут Винсент.#$b#Мама мне не разрешает разговаривать с незнакомцами... Но ты выглядишь дружелюбным.

Dialogues.Key: I wanna be just like my big brother when I grow up!$h#$e#Okay! Bye!
Dialogues.Value: Я хочу стать как мой старший брат, когда вырасту!$h#$e#Хорошо! Пока!

Dialogues.Key: Dad's not around much... I miss playing with him.$s
Dialogues.Value: Папа тут редко бывает... Я скучаю по играм с ним.$s

Dialogues.Key: *sigh*... Mom won't let me have any more gummies today.$s
Dialogues.Value: *вздох*... Мама больше не даст мне мармеладных мишек сегодня.$s

Dialogues.Key: Can you keep a secret, mister?^Can you keep a secret, miss?$u#$b#I wanna marry Miss Penny when I grow up.#$e#Just don't tell her, okay?$u
Dialogues.Value: Вы умеете хранить секреты, мистер?^Вы умеете хранить секреты, мисс?$u#$b#Я хочу пожениться с Мисс Пенни.#$e#Только не говорите ей об этом, хорошо?$u

Dialogues.Key: I wanna look for bugs, but Mom gets mad when I'm all dirty.$u#$b#It's a tough choice.
Dialogues.Value: Я хочу найти жуков, но моя мама сердится, когда я грязный.$u#$b#Это трудный выбор.

Dialogues.Key: I'm hungry... where's Mom?$s
Dialogues.Value: Я голоден... где моя мама?$s

Dialogues.Key: You're not as boring as most grown-ups!
Dialogues.Value: Вы не такой скучный, как большинство взрослых!

Dialogues.Key: #$c .3#Ew, it's boiled beet night again...$s#$e#Oh no... Mom's making lentil soup tonight.$s
Dialogues.Value: #$c .3#Фу, снова эта вареная свекла...$s#$e#А нет... Мама сегодня готовит суп из чечевицы.$s

Dialogues.Key: Dad's coming back soon!#$b#I hope he brings me some toys.$u
Dialogues.Value: Папа скоро вернется!#$b#Надеюсь, он принесет мне игрушек.$u

Dialogues.Key: Miss Penny makes me read a new book every week.$s#$b#At least she lets me pick them, sometimes!
Dialogues.Value: Мисс Пенни заставляет меня читать новую книгу каждую неделю.$s#$b#По крайней мере, она позволяет мне забрать их, иногда!

Dialogues.Key: Dad seems weird since he came back. I wonder what happened to him?$s#$b#He doesn't play with me anymore.$s
Dialogues.Value: Папа стал странным, после того как вернулся. Интересно, что с ним случилось?$s#$b#Он больше не хочет со мной играть.$s

Dialogues.Key: Hi there, mister!^Hi there, miss.
Dialogues.Value: Здравствуйте, мистер!^Здравствуйте, мисс.

Dialogues.Key: Hi Uncle @!^Hi Auntie @!#$e#Don't tell Mom... but you're my favorite grown-up.$h
Dialogues.Value: Привет, дядя @!^Привет, тетя @!#$e#Не рассказывайте моей маме... но вы мои самые любимые взрослые.$h

Dialogues.Key: Ahoy there! It's nice to see young folk movin' in to the valley. It's not very common these days.
Ahoy there, son.^Ahoy there, lass.#$b#Looks like decent weather for fishing, eh?
Have you had much luck in the local waters? You look like you could be a strong angler if you set your mind to it.
A true angler has respect for the water... don't you forget that.
The ol' Man was a fisherman, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.#$e#The fishing life is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'.
Some fish come and go with the seasons. Others only come out at night or in the rain.
*mumble* *mumble* ...Eh? I would tell you about my thoughts, but it's a fisherman's secret.
There's rumors of some very rare fish in these parts... but only an experienced angler could stand a chance against them.#$e#You'll need the finest bait you can get if you want a rare fish to bite.
If you really want to get the fish biting, make sure you put some bait on your hook.
If the local fishing scene got a bit more lively, I might expand the shop's stock.
How's the fishing life going for ya?#$e#I try to fish as often as possible, but it's not easy when you've got a shop to run.

If you purchase a high quality fishing rod, you'll be able to attach bait and tackle to the line.#$b#Bait causes fish to bite faster. Tackle can make your job a lot easier when reeling fish in.#$e#There's all kinds of tackle, with different perks. They're usually a little flimsy, so don't be surprised if your tackle breaks after a while.
Hey, it's my skipper, @!$h#$e#I'd give you a discount on bait if I could afford it.$s
Ah, yes. I have predicted your arrival a long time ago, young @.#$e#However, your fate is ultimately in your own hands.
I have seen many things about your future, young @.#$e#If I were to tell you, there could be grave consequences.
If you have nothing important to tell me, leave me be. I have much work to do.
I trust you enough to allow you in my basement. Treat what you find there with respect.
It takes years of study to understand the language of the elementals.#$e#To actually speak their language requires a lifetime of devoted effort.#$e#Now, if you'll excuse me...
There are many mysteries around us. You must be patient if you wish to discover them.
You musn't tell anyone... but I have reason to believe that one of locals is actually my daughter...#$e#I could be mistaken... It's rare but it does happen.
The townsfolk are afraid of me.#$e#It is unfortunate, but I suppose it is human to be afraid of the unknown.
I was married, long ago. After my wife and I split, she began flying around the countryside and putting curses on people.#$e#It's not a very mature way to express one's anger.
You are standing above a potent magical field.#$e#I built my hut right here on purpose, you know.
Have you made any headway with the forest spirits?
I sometimes observe the local villagers in secret.#$e#I am hoping to find an apprentice. Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue.
Ah, yes. I have predicted your arrival a long time ago, young @.#$e#However, your fate is ultimately in your own hands.
Dialogues.Value: Ах, да. Я предсказал твое прибытие давным-давно, юный @.^Ах, да. Я предсказал твое прибытие давным-давно, юная @.#$e#Тем не менее, твоя судьба в конечном итоге в твоих собственных руках.

Dialogues.Key: I have seen many things about your future, young @.#$e#If I were to tell you, there could be grave consequences.$s
Dialogues.Value: Я знаю многое о твоем будущем, юный @.^Я знаю многое о твоем будущем, юная @.#$e#Если я тебе расскажу, это может привести к серьезным последствиям.$s

Dialogues.Key: If you have nothing important to tell me, leave me be. I have much work to do.$s
Dialogues.Value: Если ты не хочешь рассказать мне что-то важное, оставь меня в покое. У меня много работы.$s

Dialogues.Key: It takes years of study to understand the language of the elementals.#$e#To actually speak their language requires a lifetime of devoted effort.#$e#Now, if you'll excuse me...$s
Dialogues.Value: Требуются годы обучения, чтобы понять язык элементалей.#$e#На самом деле, чтобы говорить на их языке, нужно посвятить обучению всю свою жизнь.#$e#Теперь, если ты извинишь  меня...$s

Dialogues.Key: There are many mysteries around us, inquisitive @. You must be patient if you wish to discover them.
Dialogues.Value: Вокруг нас много тайн, любознательный @. Ты должен быть терпелив, если хочешь, обнаружить их.^Вокруг нас много тайн, любознательная @. Ты должна быть терпелива, если хочешь, обнаружить их.

Dialogues.Key: The townsfolk are afraid of me.#$e#It is unfortunate, but I suppose humans are always afraid of the unknown.
Dialogues.Value: Горожане боятся меня.#$e#Очень жаль, но я полагаю, люди всегда боятся неизвестного.

Dialogues.Key: You are standing above a potent magical field.#$e#I built my hut right here on purpose, you know.
Dialogues.Value: Ты стоишь над мощным магическим полем.#$e#Я построил свою хижину прямо здесь, над ним, знаешь ли.

Dialogues.Key: I sometimes obvserve the local villagers in secret.#$e#I am hoping to find an apprentice. Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue.
Dialogues.Value: Я иногда тайно наблюдаю за местными жителями.#$e#Я надеюсь найти здесь ученика. Однажды я оставлю этот смертный сосуд, но мои магические исследования должны продолжаться.

Dialogues.Key: Ah, yes. I have predicted your arrival a long time ago, young @.#$e#However, your fate is ultimately in your own hands.

Dialogues.Key: Hey there!^I had some extra wood lying around... I thought maybe you could use it. Take care!  ^   -Robin %item object 388 50 %%
Dear @,^I was conducting a field study the other day, and I found this specimen. ^I hope you find it as interesting as I did.    ^   -Demetrius%item object 392 1 394 1 132 1 66 1 %%
Hello, friend.^The mountain lake has been kind to me lately. I'd like to share my good fortune with you.  ^   -Linus %item object 136 1 143 1 202 1 227 1 228 1 %%

Dear valued customer,^Thanks for visiting 'Pierre's'! Enclosed is your 'Cash-back Rewards Program' rebate. See you soon! ^   -Pierre^  P.S. Sorry for the stock message, @. Enjoy! %item money 250 601  %%
Dear @,^Here's a vegetable from the little garden I keep out back. You probably have more veggies than you know what to do with, but oh well.   ^   -Caroline%item object 190 1 192 1 24 1 %%
Found some good quality stone. ^Maybe you can build with it or something.  ^   -George %item object 390 35 %%
Hello there, dear,  I hope your farm is doing well.^ I'm sending you a little something from my kitchen... I hope it didn't crumble in the mail.  ^   -Evelyn  %item object 216 1 220 1 223 1 %%
Hey. ^I found this in a drawer somewhere. Thought you could use it.   ^   -Pam %item object 346 1 349 1 787 1 %%

@,^I'm really glad you've become part of our community! I've enclosed a 500g check from the Stardew Valley Agricultural Fund to help you continue your good work. ^Maybe you can buy some more seeds with it.  ^  Sincerely, Mr. Lewis%item money 500 501 %%
@!^I made you a little treat this morning in the saloon. Dig in!   ^   -Your friend, Gus%item object 224 1 213 1 211 1 207 1 200 1 195 1 198 1 %%
Um, Hello...     ^Sorry, I'm not good at writing letters. I made one metal bar too many, and I thought you might need it.  ^   -Clint, the blacksmith %item object 334 1 335 1 336 1 %%
Dear @,^I ordered too much fertilizer for the garden!! I bet you can put it to some good use. Take care!  ^   -Jodi %item object 368 5 369 5 370 5 %%
Hello, @.^This item was collecting dust in the toolshed. I figured you might be able to use it.  ^   -Kent%item object 286 1 287 1 288 1 787 1 %%
Hi!^How are you doing? I hope you enjoy the gift I've sent you... Well, goodbye! +   ^   -Emily %item object 397 1 428 1 440 1 %%
Dear @,^You're such a good neighbor I thought I'd send over some animal feed to make your job easier. Keep it up! ^   -Marnie %item object 178 30 %%

Hey,^I thought it would be fun to send you a letter. I don't really know what to write, though.^ Here, I've enclosed a treat for you. Don't tell anyone, but I snagged this from the back room of JojaMart ages ago.^Okay, see you soon. ^   -Shane %item object 215 1 206 1 %%
Greetings, young adept.^I have enclosed in this package an item of arcane significance. Use it wisely.   ^   -M. Rasmodius, Wizard%item object 422 1 82 1 84 1 70 1 %%
Greetings from Calico Desert!^Come visit me soon, I'm really bored out here :(. I've included a gift from the desert. You can come and thank me in person!   ^   -Sandy %item object 88 1 90 1 218 1 %%
@,^the show was a rockin' success! I wanted to say thanks again for all your help in creating this amazing band. We couldn't have done it without you!   ^   -Sam
Dear @,^Thanks again for coming to my art show. It was such a success! I sold nearly all of my sculptures, and everyone was so positive and encouraging! I hope to see you again soon.  ^   -Leah
@,^I thought it would be fun to write you a note.^ I had so much fun with the cows yesterday... I'm starting to understand why you chose the farmer's life! Hope to see you soon.  ^   -Haley
Sorry about what happened at my place yesterday... My mom can get into bad moods sometimes.^Please just forget it happened.  ^   -Penny
Dear @,^You've proven your ability to raise chickens, so I'm now selling ducks at my shop!       ^   -Marnie
Dear @,^I now have rabbits in the animal shop! They will provide you with fluffy wool ...and more!       ^   -Marnie
Dear @,^You've proven your ability to raise cows, so I'm now selling sheep at my shop!       ^   -Marnie
Dear @,^I now have goats available for purchase at the animal shop. You've done well so far!       ^   -Marnie
Dear @,^You've come a long way since you first arrived. As a result, I've decided to start selling pigs at my shop. These pigs are trained at finding gourmet truffles!       ^   -Marnie

@,^I'm going to give you this advice because I like you and I want you to stay in Pelican Town. If there comes a day that you want to ask for someone's hand in marriage, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Don't worry, everyone in Pelican Town understands the significance of the amulet. It's an ancient tradition in this region. Good luck! ^   -Lewis

@,^It seems like you're starting to get close with some of the townspeople. If you want to show someone that you're romantically interested, you've got to give them one of my beautiful flower bouquets. I'm selling them now, for a very fair price! If you want to start a family someday, this is the first step! ^   -Pierre
Dear @,^here is an old recipe that my grandma passed down to me. Enjoy!   ^   -Robin%item cookingRecipe %%
I wanted to say 'thanks' for taking an interest in my work. Here's a cooking recipe that I like. ^   -Demetrius%item cookingRecipe %%
@,^how are you doing? I've enclosed some instructions on how to make one of my favorite fish recipes. ^   -Linus%item cookingRecipe %%
TOP SECRET:^Here's the recipe for my famous bluberry tart.^Don't tell anyone! I'm giving it to you because we are such good friends. ^   -Pierre%item cookingRecipe %%
Dear @,^nothing is more satsifying than cooking with fresh vegetables from your own garden! I've enclosed a recipe to help you out. Take care, ^   -Caroline%item cookingRecipe %%
Figured I'd give you this recipe I had laying around. Try not to burn it. ^   -George%item cookingRecipe %%
Dear @,^I usually don't give out my recipes... but since you've been such a sweetheart to George and I, I've written this one down for you. ^   -Evelyn%item cookingRecipe %%
Hey Kid,^here's the recipe for a little treat my pappy used to make. Cook it slow. ^   -Pam%item cookingRecipe %%
@,^remember to eat healthy, or you won't have enough energy to work hard! I'm including one of my favorite recipes. Make sure to use ripe tomatoes! ^   -Lewis%item cookingRecipe %%
Dear @,^Here's a recipe from my saloon. I only share this with my good friends! ^   -Gus%item cookingRecipe %%
Well, I know a couple of recipes.^I thought I'd send you one... maybe it'll help you mine more ore or something.^Take care. ^   -Clint%item cookingRecipe %%
@,^this recipe of mine won 1st place in a cooking competition! I hope you like it. Thanks for being a friend! ^   -Jodi%item cookingRecipe %%
Picked up this recipe overseas. Enjoy.^Want to say thanks for making me feel welcome. ^^   -Kent%item cookingRecipe %%
@!^Flip this letter over for instructions on how to make a super-healthy meal!^You'll feel energized. See you soon. ^   -Emily%item cookingRecipe %%

Dear neighbor,^when I'm not taking care of animals I like to experiment in the kitchen. Since we've become friends I want to share some recipes with you.^I hope you like this! ^   -Marnie%item cookingRecipe %%
@,^I found this recipe in a magazine and I thought it sounded interesting. Feel free to give me a taste if you make it. hehe. ^   -Shane%item cookingRecipe %%
Dear @,^I was so bored out here in the desert that I wrote you a letter. There's a recipe for a delicious soup enclosed. Come visit me soon! ^   -Sandy%item cookingRecipe %%
Dear @,^I'd like to share an ol' cooking recipe my pappy used to make. It's important the fish is FRESH.  ^   -Willy%item cookingRecipe %%

Dear @,^  How are you doing, sweety? I've missed you so much since you left. I hope the farming life is everything you hoped for. ^   Love, Mom.   ^   P.S. I sent your favorite cookies < %item object 223 1 %%

Dear @,^  It's been so long since I heard from you, dear. Things are the same as ever back home. I miss you very much. ^  Love, Mom ^ P.S. Found an envelope with some money Grandpa left for you. %item money 500 501 %%
Dear @,^  I saw an article about you in the local paper! It sounds like the country life is a good fit for you! I'm so proud of you. Take care, sweety. Love, Mom

Dear @,^ How are things going? You must really be making a fortune on that farm. Don't forget your dear old mother when you're a millionaire! ^  Love, Mom   ^   P.S. Enjoy the cake!%item object 221 1 %%

Dear @,^  Have you settled into your new life yet? I can't believe you're all grown up now... Time sure flies. Now that you're gone I have all this extra money laying around, so I included a little gift.^  Love, Dad.%item money 500 501 %%

Dear @,^  How is the country life going for you? It's been lonely here without you, but I'm proud of what you're doing.^  Love, Dad  ^  P.S. Found an envelope with some money Grandpa left for you. %item money 500 501 %%

Dear @,^  I read an article about you in the local paper! I'm so impressed with your progress on the farm! Keep this up and dear old Dad might be retiring in a fern islands luxury bungalow after all ;).^  Love, Dad

Dear @,^ I know you're busy on the farm and that's why you can't visit. I understand. You've been working so hard... keep it up and you can accomplish anything! ^ Love, Dad  ^  P.S. Included some quality stone %item object 390 30 %%

Greetings, @.^It is our pleasure to inform you that your farm will be featured in next week's 'up & coming' column of the Stardew Valley Tribune! Congratulations. We're impressed with your quick progress. ^   -SVT

ADVERTISEMENT:^"I keep finding cool stuff, but my backpack is full!"^^Does this sound like you? Well, Pierre's got you covered!^^Stop by Pierre's General Store TODAY and check out our affordable size 24 backpack!^ See you soon!
ADVERTISEMENT:^^Pierre's General Store is now open 7 days a week!

Dear Farmer @,^^I'd like to apologize for joking about your Grandpa's old cottage when we first met. It's really a nice little house!^^However, you might need some more space someday. That's where I can help. If you bring me some raw materials and pay a fee, I can expand your house.^(Continued on next page)^^The first expansion I offer includes a kitchen. With a kitchen, you'll be able to cook any recipes you've learned!^^Anyway, I hope you're starting to feel at home in Stardew Valley!^^    Your local carpenter,^        Robin
Dear @,^the shipping tax passed. As of today, a 3% tax will be deducted from all your shipping profits. The reduced fee for public services is also in effect. See you soon! ^   -Mayor
Dear @,^the shipping tax was rejected. Your shipping profits will remain as they are. Fees for public services will remain the same as well. See you soon. ^   -Mayor

@,^I've heard you've been giving some people a hand around town! Everyone seems really thankful. I'm awarding you this month's "Best Neighbor" award (with a small cash prize). Keep it up! ^   -Mayor%item money 500 501 %%

Dear @,^you've been such a help around town since you moved here... everyone keeps telling me all the wonderful things you've done for them! Please accept this thank-you prize. ^   -Mayor%item money 2500 2501 %%

@,^I am pleased to announce that you've been chosen as "Neighbor of the year"! That comes with a 10,000g prize! Congratulations! Everyone in town wants to say 'thanks' for all you've done. ^   -Mayor%item money 10000 10001 %%
@,^it's time for the quarterly Stardew Hero rankings! I've enclosed them in a separate envelope. Good luck this season!  ^   -The Mayor
%update

Dear @,^ Your angling skills surpass even my ol' Pappy's... I'm impressed. ^ This stardrop's been passed down from Willy Sr. to Willy Jr. for... oh, heck. Prob'ly a thousand years.^Seein' as I don't have any kids... I want you to have it.^^ -Willy   ^  %item object 434 1 %%

Dear @ and spouse,^Congratulations! Your adoption application has been aproved.^We're working hard to choose the perfect baby to match your profile.^Your new family member will arrive in 2 weeks.^^-Ferngill Adoption Agency
Secret Message: If you can reach the bottom of the mines one more time, a secret awaits you. Be careful, the mines have become more dangerous.

Dear neighbor,^I hope you are feeling settled in your new home. I am writing to let you know that Pierre's store is now selling fertilizers! Why don't you swing by and see if you can afford a few dozen boxes or so?  ^   -Pierre
Dear @,^I am now selling higher quality fertilizers, as well as new crop selections! See you soon. ^   -Pierre
Hi @.^One of these days you should come to my room after dark... Maybe around 8pm. ^I want to show you something. ^   -Abby
Meet me in the bath house after dark. ^   -Penny

Dear @,^^Thank you for purchasing a coop upgrade! In addition to doubling the capacity of your coop, I've taken the liberty of installing an incubator. ^To use the incubator, simply place an egg inside. If you have space left in your coop, the egg will hatch in several days!^^As always, thanks for your business.^-Robin
Hi.^^Me sell hats. Okay, poke?^^Come to old old old haus, poke. Bring coines.^^-hat mouse

Congratulations!!^^You beat 'Journey Of The Prairie King', and were randomly selected in our exclusive winner's sweepstakes! ^You've won a Prairie King Arcade System of your very own!^Now you can enjoy 'Journey Of The Prairie King' from the comfort of your own home.^^You deserve it!.^-Prairie King Development Team %item bigobject 141 %%

Congratulations!!^^You beat all the levels in 'JunimoKart'... you're actually the first person in the entire Ferngill Republic to do so!^Your prize: a home version of Junimo Kart!^^Have fun!^-Junimo Kart Development Team %item bigobject 159 %%
@,^I have great news... my novel is finished!! I'm giving a public reading this afternoon at the library. Hope to see you there! ^   -Elliott
Meet me at the docks on a sunny morning. I've got something in mind. ^   -Elliott
@,^I have a surprise for you. Meet me by the railroad tracks. ^   -Harvey
@,^meet me in front of my house tonight after dark. ^   -Sam
@,^meet me at the saloon tonight after dark. ^   -Alex
Dear @,^Someone dropped your tools into the lost and found bin last night.^^I came in and set them next to your bed.^Hope I didn't wake you... ^^  -Mayor Lewis
I've got some new items in stock...^A deluxe fishing pole and some bait that you can attach to it!^You can use bait to make fish bite faster. Hope to see you soon! ^   -Willy
Come by the shop and check out the new rods I'm selling.^They're the best money can buy... and you can customize them with different kinds of tackle!^Hope to see you soon! ^   -Willy

My sources tell me you've been poking around inside the old community center.^Why don't you pay me a visit?^My chambers are west of the forest lake, in the stone tower. I may have information concerning your... 'rat problem'.^   -M. Rasmodius, Wizard %item quest 1 true %%

Dear @,^I would like to give you some information about an upcoming event: the Feast of the Winter Star. It's a time for the community to come together and think back on all the good fortune we've had this year.^A favorite tradition is the "secret gift exchange", where everyone in town is randomly assigned to someone else. On the day of the festival, everyone brings a gift for their secret friend and surprise them with something special!^This year, your secret friend is:^    %secretsanta ^Don't tell anyone! The feast will take place on the 25th from 10AM to 2PM at the town square. See you then! ^   -Mayor Lewis

Dear @,^Everyone around town has been talking about your great generosity lately!^Apparently, packages have been appearing in people's houses containing items they posted about years ago on the community center bulletin! And the packages are all addressed from your farm!^Thanks for going out of your way to do something like that... all of us in town are delighted! ^   -Mayor Lewis

I see you've been exploring the old mine. You've got the adventurer's spirit, that much I can tell.^If you can slay 10 slimes, you'll have earned your place in my adventurer's guild. ^Be careful.    -Marlon %item quest 15 true %%

I see you've entered the Skull Cavern. Well done.^I've got a better challenge for you, kid. Make it at least 25 levels deep. I've got a mountain of $ to send if you can do it.^  Your friend, Mr. Qi %item quest 20 %%

Robin here!^I know there's a lot of stone scattered around your farm.^If you have a surplus, you might consider having me build a well for you.^Wells can be placed all over your farm, and serve as convenient places to refill your watering can.^^Just swing by my shop with 75 stones and 1000g when you're ready for it.^-Robin

You did it.^ I'm very impressed.^ Enjoy your reward.^   -Qi. %item money 10000 %%
Hello there,^Just got back from a fishing trip. You should come down to the beach some time.^I've got something for ya.^-Willy %item quest 13 true %%
Dear @,^Tomorrow we're holding the Egg Festival in the town square. ^^You should arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to attend.^You wouldn't want to miss the annual egg hunt!^  -Mayor Lewis

Hello, dear...^^I know you're just getting started as a gardener, so I wanted to give you a little tip.^^Most crops only grow in one season. When summer arrives, your spring crops will all die out. So plan ahead!^^-Granny Evelyn

Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all getting together for the Flower Dance.^^If you can find a partner, you might even want to participate in the dance yourself!^There's a little clearing beyond the forest west of town where we hold the dance. Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you're interested.^  -Mayor Lewis

Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering at the beach for the annual Pelican Town Luau.^^The highlight of the event is the communal potluck. Make sure you bring something good to contribute!^The governor himself is attending the event, so make sure you're on your best behavior.^Come to the beach sometime between 9 AM and 2 PM.^   -Mayor Lewis

Dear @,^Tonight at around 10 o'clock PM, a rare and beautiful event will take place.^^The moonlight jellies will be passing by Pelican Town on their long journey south for the winter.^^We're all gathering at the beach to watch. You don't want to miss this!^See you tonight,^ -Demetrius

Dear @,^One week from today, we are holding the Stardew Valley Fair in the town square!^It's the biggest event of the year, drawing people from all across the country to our humble town.^If you'd like, you can set up a grange display for the event. Just bring up to 9 items that best showcase your talents. You'll be judged on the quality and diversity of your display.^The fair starts at 9 AM... don't miss it!^   -Mayor Lewis

Dear @,^I just want to remind you that the Stardew Valley Fair is happening tomorrow.^Don't forget to bring your 9 items for the grange display.^Remember, the fair starts at 9AM in the town square. See you there!^   -Mayor Lewis

Dear @,^Notice a chill in the air? It could just be the approach of winter...^Or it could be the tingle of a dark specter, here to help us celebrate tomorrow's festival... the Spirit's Eve.^Come to town at 10 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Mayor Lewis

Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering in front of Marnie's house for the Festival of Ice.^^It's a celebration of winter... there'll be snowmen, ice sculptures, and an ice fishing competition!^Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Mayor Lewis
MISSING:^I lost my favorite Axe! If you find it, please return ASAP. I'm having a tough time without it. There's 250g in it for whoever finds the thing.^   -Robin%item quest 100 %%
Farmer @-^I have a request for you. I need fresh cauliflower for a recipe I want to make. Could you bring me one?^   -Jodi%item quest 101 %%

@-^This is embarrassing... I lost my lucky purple shorts. I'm telling you because I think I can trust you.^If you find them, bring them back to me DISCREETLY. I'll pay well.^Thanks.^   -Mayor Lewis%item quest 102 %%
Hey Kid,^My throat's about as dry as a desert bone. I'm real thirsty for a pale ale. You got one? Regular old beer won't do. I need a pale ale.^   -Pam%item quest 103 %%

@-^I'm gathering data on the correlation between soil alkalinity and crop fructose levels. Long story short, I need a fresh melon from your farm. If you brought me one I'd be very grateful.^   -Demetrius%item quest 104 %%

To Farmer @:^My knee's acting up again, and you know what helps? ^Rubbing the darn thing with hot pepper.^ Trouble is, my supply's run dry. If you've got one to spare I'd be much obliged.^   -George %item quest 105 %%
Dear @,^I'd like to give my cows a special treat. They're such good girls and hungry, too. Could you bring me one bunch of amaranth? They love the stuff. ^Thanks, Dear.^   -Marnie %item quest 106 %%
Hello,^It's blackberry season right now. The bushes are full of them. I want to pick some, but I lost my basket. Can you help?^   -Linus%item quest 107 %%
@-^I'd like to buy a pumpkin from you. My daughter and I want to carve a jack-o-lantern for the upcoming Spirit's Eve festival. ^   -Caroline%item quest 108 %%
Hey, I've got a little challenge for you:^    Catch me a squid.^You can fish them from the ocean at night. They only show up in the winter, though.^   -Willy%item quest 109 %%
I've got an unusual request. Could you keep this a secret?^ I want you to deliver an amethyst to Emily. It's her favorite stone. Tell her it's from me.^   -Clint %item quest 110 %%
@-^I am resarching the forgotten art of shadow divination. I require an item known as 'Void Essence'. Bring it to me and you will be rewarded.^ -M. Rasmodius, Wizard %item quest 111 %%

@,^Sorry to bother you again, but I need another favor.^I got a new hammer and I want to try it on a variety of metals.^Could you smelt an iron bar and bring it to me? ^Thanks.^ -Clint %item quest 112 %%

@-^How are you doing? Hope the winter hasn't been too hard on you.^Anyway, I'm writing to ask you for some hardwood. I need about ten pieces, if you've got it.^If not, no worries. Take Care!^  -Robin%item quest 113 %%
Dear @-^I want to make fish stew, but I need an albacore! I know they're almost out of season... sorry about the short notice. Could you catch one for me?^   -Gus%item quest 114 %%
@-^I'm really craving a fresh apricot. I haven't been able to find one at the store, so I'm asking you. I'll pay you well for it!^   -Emily%item quest 115 %%
Dear @,^I'd like to surprise my husband with a gift. He's a big fan of leeks. Could you bring me one?^   -Granny Evelyn%item quest 116 %%
NOTICE^Pierre here... I really, really want a plate of sashimi. I'll pay top coin to whoever brings me some.^   -Pierre%item quest 117 %%
Fisherman Wanted^I need a good pufferfish specimen. I'm conducting an experiment on the toxin created by the pufferfish.^Reward: 1000g^ -Demetrius%item quest 118 %%
Dear Farmer @,^I'd like to give my wife a starfruit for our anniversary. Are you growing any on your farm? If you brought me one, I'd be very grateful.^   -Kent%item quest 119 %%
@,^I need truffle oil. Don't ask me why.^ -Mayor Lewis%item quest 120 %%
Wanted: 1 Fresh Lobster for a marvelous bisque I'm creating.^Who: Gus, proprieter of the Stardrop Saloon^Reward: 800g %item quest 121 %%
NOTICE^Does anybody have one of them battery packs? My TV remote died, and it's a real hassle getting off the couch to change the station.^  -Pam%item quest 122 %%

@,^I'm creating an enchanted staff of phenomenal power.^However, I'm missing something: an Iridium Bar.^I'm willing to pay 5x the market value for it. Bring it as soon as you can.^ -M. Rasmodius, Wizard %item quest 123 %%
I've got another challenge for you: Catch me a Lingcod.^They don't go down easy, but I know you can do it.^  -Willy%item quest 124 %%
Dear @,^I'm at my wit's end. I desperately want to make a Coco-no-no at the saloon, but I have no way of getting a coconut!^Can you help me?^  -Gus%item quest 125 %%
Dear @,^Tomorrow is the Feast of the Winter Star.^Did you get a gift for your 'secret friend'... %secretsanta?^The feast starts at 9 AM in the town square. See you then! ^   -Mayor Lewis

Dialogues.Key: I'm really excited.$h#$b#I'm going to be your wife. Hehe.$l
I need to get mentally prepared for being a farmer's wife.
...$l#$e#I'm a little nervous. But happy.$h
I've always dreamed of living on a farm.$h#$e#I'm going to be so happy.
I'm so happy!$h#$e#It's just like I always dreamed.$l
It's okay. I know we can't have a honeymoon, since your farm needs to be taken care of.#$e#I'm a farmer now, too!
@.. I'm a little scared. This is such a big change!#$e#Don't worry, I'm really happy, too.$h
We're going to have a little farm family, soon.$l#$e#I'm so glad you feel this way about me.$h
Hehe. Me? Married? I never thought this would happen.$h#$e#We're going to have a lot of fun together.$h
I'm engaged to a farmer. Wow!$h#$e#Our lives are going to be a lot different from now on.$l
I'm going to be really happy as your husband, @.$l#$e#I'm excited.
I never dreamed this would happen. I'm so lucky.$l#$e#I can't wait till the wedding.$h
In a couple days I'm going to be living on a farm. I can't believe it.$h#$e#I'm happy, though.$l
When you showed up in town, I never thought I'd be marrying you some day.$l#$e#Life is strange, huh?$h
Oh my goodness! I have so much to prepare before the wedding! I'm nervous.$l#$e#I'll be relieved after we're all settled in on your farm.$h
I'm really happy.$h#$e#This was always my secret wish.$l
The farm will be such a lovely place to write. I'm really looking forward to this.$h#$e#We're going to make a great pair.$l
This is going to be such an adventure! I'm really excited. Aren't you?$h#$e#We can use my cottage as a beach house.$l
@, this is the greatest thing that could have happened.$l#$e#I can't wait.$h
I'm going to love being a farmer.$h
